body.p: The undersigned would respectfully represent to the Gov of Ky the Hon Beriah McGoffin that he is a poor man with a family to support and at the last term of the Trigg circuit court He was fined Twenty Dollars and cost for Selling Liquor without Licence the undersigned would respectfuly say he is clear of the charge and if his family had been in Health he would have proven the fact to the court but my family was sick So that I could not be present & my Lawyer failed to attend to the case
Under the circumstances I would respectfully pray you to remit the fine as it will under present circumstances go hard with me to pay the same
We would respectfuly request our very Hon Gov to grant the pray of Mr W H Dyer May 10/61

Jno J Rouch
